price: Ni’imaa irraa wanti isin bira jiru Rabbuma irraayyi. Ergasii yeroo miidhaan isin tuqe, garuma Isaatti waywaattu.
arabic: وَمَا بِكُم مِّن نِّعۡمَةٖ فَمِنَ ٱللَّهِۖ ثُمَّ إِذَا مَسَّكُمُ ٱلضُّرُّ فَإِلَيۡهِ تَجۡـَٔرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamā bikum min niʿ'matin famina al-lahi thumma idhā massakumu al-ḍuru fa-ilayhi tajarūna
